articles.title: 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now
articles.description:
The best of what's new streaming on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max, Disney Plus, and more.

summary: Discover five new movies and TV shows available for streaming in February 2026.

Boston residents can enjoy diverse entertainment options during winter months.

articles.title: Court says Mass. father’s battle over LGBTQ-friendly lessons excludes books on gender stereotypes
articles.description:
The man’s lawsuit against Lexington’s school district “raises issues of ‘marriage, gender, and sexuality,’ not gender stereotyping,” a federal judge pointed out.

The post Court says Mass. father’s battle over LGBTQ-friendly lessons excludes books on gender stereotypes appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Federal judge ruled against Lexington father’s lawsuit on LGBTQ-friendly lessons on February 13, 2026.
Judge stated the case involves marriage, gender, and sexuality, not gender stereotyping.
Decision affects parental rights regarding educational content in Lexington schools.

summary: Roman Anthony, 21, aims to join Team USA for the World Baseball Classic.

articles.title: 10 Celtics stats that should show encouragement and discouragement entering All-Star break
articles.description:
We all know how well Jaylen Brown has played this season, but the Celtics haven't been overly reliant on him to a fault.

The post 10 Celtics stats that should show encouragement and discouragement entering All-Star break appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics' performance shows balanced reliance on players, not just Jaylen Brown.
Jaylen Brown's strong season contributes to Celtics' overall success as they approach All-Star break.
Local fans remain hopeful as Celtics maintain competitive edge heading into the second half of the season.
